channel.title: Help with runserver.bat
channel.description:
I clicked runserver.bat and it came up in a black window
Starting RealisticScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
I also set up a Hamachi server too. I was told the I.P to my server was the numbers on top of my Hamachi which is [glow=red,2,300]5.127.102.139[/glow]. When I load up Moparscape and try to join it says "Error Connecting To Server. Must be down." When I click runserver is it suppose to say Starting RealisticScape Server on 5.127.102.139:43594 ? But whatever it is I cannot connect to my server. What do I do?

item.title: Help with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @StRPkeR244 StRPkeR244
item.description:
@StRPkeR244 wrote:

and how exactly do i do that. I changed my path in system.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Kage_Buushin_no_juts Kage Buushin no jutsu
item.description:
@Kage_Buushin_no_juts wrote:

uhh heyy… thats means u started your server and you have to have the specified path

Read full topic
